snippet: Phillip H. Solomon, a senior at Hendrick Hudson High School in Montrose, was chosen to play in the tour of the National Youth Orchestra of the United States of America.
abstract: Phillip H Solomon, senior at Hendrick Hudson High School in Montrose, was chosen by Carnegie Hall's Weill Music Institute for clarinetist position in tour by the National Youth Orchestra of the United States of America (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: Phillip H. Solomon, a senior at Hendrick Hudson High School in Montrose, was chosen to play in the tour of the National Youth Orchestra of the United States of America.

headline.main: For High School Senior, It’s Clarinet First, Then Homework
